data.name: EventFormatBasic
data.value:
''' <summary> ''' Gets the event of $propertyName$. ''' </summary> <MonitoredItem(nodeId: "$nodeId$", attributeId: AttributeIds.EventNotifier)> Public Property $propertyName$() As $dataType$ Get Return _$fieldName$ End Get Private Set(ByVal value As $dataType$) SetProperty(_$fieldName$, value) End Set End Property
Private _$fieldName$ As $dataType$

data.name: EventFormatCSharp
MethodFormatBasic
data.value:
''' <summary> ''' Invokes the method $propertyName$ ''' </summary> ''' <param name="inArgs">The input arguments.</param> ''' <returns>A <see cref="Task"/> that returns the output arguments.</returns> Public Async Function $propertyName$(ByVal ParamArray inArgs() As Object) As Task(Of Object())
Dim response As CallResponse = Await UaTcpSessionClient.FromModel(Me).CallAsync(New CallRequest With { .MethodsToCall = { New CallMethodRequest With { .ObjectId = NodeId.Parse("$parentNodeId$"), .MethodId = NodeId.Parse("$nodeId$"), .InputArguments = inArgs.ToVariantArray() } } }) Dim result As CallMethodResult = response.Results(0) If StatusCode.IsBad(result.StatusCode) Then Throw New ServiceResultException(New ServiceResult(result.StatusCode)) End If
Return result.OutputArguments.ToObjectArray() End Function

data.name: MethodFormatCSharp
ReadOnlyValueFormatBasic
data.value:
''' <summary> ''' Gets the value of $propertyName$. ''' </summary> <MonitoredItem(nodeId: "$nodeId$")> Public Property $propertyName$() As $dataType$ Get Return _$fieldName$ End Get Private Set(ByVal value As $dataType$) SetProperty(_$fieldName$, value) End Set End Property
Private _$fieldName$ As $dataType$

data.name: ReadOnlyValueFormatCSharp
ValueFormatBasic
data.value:
''' <summary> ''' Gets or sets the value of $propertyName$. ''' </summary> <MonitoredItem(nodeId: "$nodeId$")> Public Property $propertyName$() As $dataType$ Get Return _$fieldName$ End Get Set(ByVal value As $dataType$) SetProperty(_$fieldName$, value) End Set End Property
Private _$fieldName$ As $dataType$

data.name: ValueFormatCSharp
